interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bioken] Cera Silkway Salon Quality Hair Serum - Enriched Premium Argan Oil (1.7 fl oz)
Review Date: 2020/10/16
Store: Bioken
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Argan Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Bioken', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '856312005529'}
Review Text: You know when you get your hair done and you leave the salon with your hair smelling amazing the rest of the day...that's what this serum is like! It smells so good. I use it when my hair is wet or when I am just refreshing it mid day. Love it!
Review Title: SMELLS AMAZING!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} This does exactly what it's supposed to do! Easy to use, my feet are super soft afterwards. Charges quickly. Great choice! Works Wonderfully! Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} I am obsessed with face masks! These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They have no scent, which is a good thing. Each mask has 2 steps... 1st step is four contour pads for under eye and frown lines and 2nd step is a full sheet mask. It feels amazing on my face! It doesn't shift around at all. I leave it on for 30 minutes and then apply my nighttime moisturizer.

Relaxing to wear
My skin really felt more firm after I used it
Closed my pores

Overall, I really liked this mask. I have tried probably 100 different face masks in my life and this is definitely in my TOP 5. STOP and BUY THIS! GO! Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer leuxe {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'} When I first began using this I definitely broke out a little more on my chin. I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go! I can see and feel the difference. Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} I wanted to use this for a while before I wrote a review and I absolutely love this stuff! It goes on easily and absorbs well. I feel like my skin looks smoother. I defintely recommend it! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Bioken] Cera Silkway Salon Quality Hair Serum - Enriched Premium Argan Oil (1.7 fl oz) Bioken {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Argan Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Bioken', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '856312005529'} You know when you get your hair done and you leave the salon with your hair smelling amazing the rest of the day...that's what this serum is like! It smells so good. I use it when my hair is wet or when I am just refreshing it mid day. Love it! SMELLS AMAZING!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user remains dedicated to effective and user-friendly personal care products, with a recent purchase highlighting a continued commitment to enhancing hair health alongside skin care aesthetic.

- **Product Type Preference:** The user displays a growing interest in hair care products, specific to oils and serums, alongside their existing preference for electric personal care tools, sheet masks, and nourishing skin oils. This reflects a broadened focus on overall personal grooming.

- **Functionality Focus:** They prioritize products that deliver visible results for both skin and hair concerns, emphasizing smoothness, nourishment, and scent appeal, as evidenced by their latest acquisition.

- **Convenience & Efficiency:** Ease of application remains essential, with product choices designed for quick absorption and integration into their self-care routine, allowing for refreshing experiences without effort.

- **Positive Experience:** Recent interactions indicate a consistent trend of satisfaction with product performance, reinforcing their transformative journey toward healthier-looking skin and hair, with enhanced textures and aromas.

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** The user continues to favor aesthetically pleasing and modern personal care items, appreciating innovative design and high functionality across both skin and hair care products.

Overall, the user profile highlights an ongoing exploration of effective, stylish, and easy-to-use personal care products that provide visible improvements, contributing to a comprehensive self-care regimen tailored to their multifaceted beauty needs.
